## Instructor

### Benjamin Soltoff

```{r out.width = "50%", echo = FALSE}
knitr::include_graphics(path = here::here("images", "ben-soltoff.jpg"))
```

- [soltoffbc@uchicago.edu](mailto:soltoffbc@uchicago.edu)

Dr. Soltoff is an Assistant Senior Instructional Professor in Computational Social Science and Associate Director of the [Masters in Computational Social Science](https://macss.uchicago.edu) at the University of Chicago. He leads the CSS Technical Skills workshop. He currently teaches courses on social scientific research design, computational modeling, data science, math/statistics, and data visualization. For more information, visit his [homepage](https://www.bensoltoff.com).
